name: How to create sketchy (hand-drawn) style primitives in Figma
description:
Step-by-step guide on how to restyle Figma wireframes, illustrations, icons, and any primitives making them look "sketchy" or "hand-drawn-like".


This is a universal, super-fast, and more flexible way to create captivating results in Figma.


Do not limit yourself to the existing set of primitives from the kits and shape libraries. Just create custom sketchy shapes, icons, and illustrations in a couple of clicks!


And it's free of charge!
